Detailed Description

Class for ROS driver.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ Driver() [1/2]

dephan_ros::Driver::Driver ( std::string  ip_addr,
unsigned  port,
std::string  topic_name,
bool  is_full = false 
)

Driver UDP mode constructor.

Parameters
[in]ip_addrIp address of the LiDar device.
[in]portNetwork port of the LiDar device.
[in]topic_nameName of the topic for pointcloud v2 messages
[in]is_fullFlag for LiDar angle (true for 2 pi rad segment per packet, false for 2 pi / 18 rad segment per packet).

Parameters
[in]pcap_pathPath to the target PCAP file.
[in]topic_nameName of the topic for pointcloud v2 messages.
[in]is_fullFlag for LiDar angle (true for 2 pi rad segment per packet, false for 2 pi / 18 rad segment per packet).
